  • public class Enemy
extends GameCharacter
    The Enemy class represents an enemy that tries to attack the user
    Version:
    May 26, 2020
    Author:
    Jeffrey Lee, Raeed Azom, Period: 1, Assignment: APCS Final Project, Sources: none
